name: Nike Air Max 90 SP Patta Waves Sapphire
Nike Air Max 90 SP Patta Waves Cyber
Nike Air Max 90 Leather Triple White

details.description:
The Nike Air Max 90 Leather Triple White 2020 takes on a 1990 original design, and is covered in an all-white finish.
​
​The sneaker is constructed of white TPU eyelets, a mesh upper with stitched leather overlays, a waffle-tread rubber outsole for traction and an Air-infused midsole for cushioning. Further, it displays Air Max units on both medial sides with a padded tongue panel printed with a Nike Swoosh emblem. Additionally, this Air Max Triple version has printed Nike branding on its heel.
​
​The Nike Air Max 90 Leather Triple White 2020 debuted on July 28th, 2020, and retailed at $130.

name: Nike Air Max 90 SP Patta Waves Particle Grey Coconut Milk
Nike Air Max 90 QS Volcano

details.description:
Step into the Nike Air Max 90 QS Volcano, a black, magma orange, and laser orange colorway that pulls design inspiration from the raw beauty of molten landscapes.

The Volcano Nike Air Max 90 QS is a bold eruption on the sneaker scene, as it‚Äôs a limited-edition colorway. Its rugged black upper mimics volcanic rock with textured overlays, while striking magma orange and molten yellow accents add some heat. The iconic Swoosh is a sizzling orange with black lava details. The signature Air Max unit, tinted in fiery hues, adds depth and energy to the design, creating a layered and dynamic look. The volcano theme continues to the sock liners where flame graphics appear.

We love the Nike Air Max 90 QS Volcano‚Äôs scorching design which is a combination of rugged textures, vibrant details, and iconic cushioning. When it debuted on the market on February 23, 2025, this sneaker sold for $140.

name: Nike Air Max 90 Recraft Triple White

details.description:
The Nike Air Max 90 Recraft Triple White was first designed by Tinker Hatfield and was re-released for the celebration of the shoe’s 30th anniversary. It provides plenty of support and cushion.

This model provides a fresh take on the original Air Max 90 Infrared. It has a white sole as well as a white base and is made of a mixture of leather, suede overlays, and mesh. On the shoe, you will also find a white leather mudguard.

The Nike Air Max 90 Recraft Triple White had an initial release date of January 2020. The starting price for this model was $160.

name: Nike Air Max 90 Leather Triple Black

details.description:
The Nike Air Max 90 Leather Triple Black 2020 was released as an addition to the Nike Air Max 90 collection. 

The Leather Triple Nike Air Max 90 Black 2020 has a midsole that is equipped with Nike's patented Air Max technology, providing maximum comfort and cushioning with each step. The air unit is visible through the outsole of the shoe. The outsole of the sneaker features a waffle pattern that provides excellent traction and grip on various surfaces. 

We think that one outstanding feature of the Nike Air Max 90 Leather Triple Black 2020 is its colorway. The upper of the Nike Air Max 90 Leather Triple Black 2020 sneaker is made with multiple leather panels, which are all black. The panels are textured, giving the shoe a unique design that stands out from other sneakers. The Nike Air Max 90 Leather Triple Black 2020 was released on July 28th, 2020 at a retail price of $130.

name: Nike Air Max 90 Recraft Triple Black

details.description:
The Nike Air Max 90 Recraft Triple Black features a black sole, midsole, and body. It'ss made from a variety of materials, including plastic and suede, which give it a matte appearance. Part of the midsole is transparent and hollow to help keep it lightweight.

The Air Max 90 Recraft in Triple Black by Nike was an original 1990 design of Tinker Hatfield. The sneaker also features a breathable mesh lining and a padded tongue.

The Nike Air Max 90 Recraft Triple Black first became available for purchase in January of 2020. This model had a retail price of $120.

name: Nike Air Max 90 Iron Grey

details.description:
Originally designed as running shoes, the Nike Air Max 90 Iron Grey sticks to its roots with the Waffle sole, a textile/leather upper, and classic TPU details.

The Nike Air Max 90 Iron Grey features a textile upper with leather and synthetic overlays. Most of the sneaker is in iron grey, with the Swooshes appearing in white on the lateral and medial sides. The low top also includes a padded tongue and collar for maximum comfort, and underfoot, Max Air cushioning provides cushioning, while the Waffle sole adds traction and durability.

The Nike Air Max 90 Iron Grey was released in January 2020 and retailed for $120.

name: Nike Air Max 90 Light Bone Neutral Olive
Nike Air Max 90 Reverse Duck Camo

details.description:
Nike celebrated Air Max Day 2020 by releasing the Nike Air Max 90 Reverse Duck Camo. This colorway is a fresh take on the classic Atmos Air Max 90 design that debuted in 2013.

This Air Max 90 consisted of an Infrared mesh upper with a Duck Camo mudguard and black quarter panels. A Nike Air branded heel tab, white midsole, and a mixed infrared and black outsole completes the design.

The Nike Air Max 90 Reverse Duck Camo released in March of 2020 and retailed for $140. The Nike Air Max 90 Reverse Duck Camo re-released in September of 2024.

name: Nike Air Max 90 SP Patta Waves Black Particle Grey
Nike Air Max 90 Recraft Wolf Grey

details.description:
Originally designed for running, Nike Air Max 90 Recraft Wolf Grey features versatile heritage delivered in style and substance.

The Nike Air Max 90 Recraft Wolf Grey has a thick and full-bodied silhouette. Its midsole has a thick Air Max unit visible in the heel. The toe box's upper, collar, and roof are covered with gray synthetic fabric stitched into a tight grid pattern. Its overlays around the toe box, eyelets, across the side, and on the heel are all in gray leather. The overlays feature a partially obscured Nike Swoosh and an Air Max logo.

The Nike Air Max 90 Recraft Wolf Grey was released on 14th February 2020 at a retail price of $120.

name: Nike Air Max 90 Leopard Sanddrift Black (Women's)
Nike Air Max 90 PRM Sail Burgundy Crush
Nike Air Max 90 Premium Bio Beige Safety Orange Camo
Nike Air Max 90 Cool Grey Dusty Cactus Black Wolf Grey
Nike Air Max 90 Gore-Tex Infrared

details.description:
The Nike Air Max 90 Gore-Tex Infrared is a sneaker made with Air Max units and waterproof technology.

This iteration of the Nike Air Max 90 features an upper made of Gore-Tex, a waterproof and breathable fabric, and lightweight mesh. The base is white, while leather and synthetic overlays in light gray round out the toebox and run up to the top of the laces. The Nike Swoosh appears in dark gray on the midsoles. Black overlays run up both sides of the shoe above the outsole with small red boxes featuring the Gore-Tex logo. The Nike Air logo appears on the heel, while the tongue contains a red Gore-Tex logo. The thick red and white outsole contains visible Air Max units under the heel.

What we like most about this shoe is the black overlay that runs up each side above the outsole, which gives the shoe a thinner and more streamlined look. The Nike Air Max 90 Gore-Tex Infrared was released on January 11, 2024, for a price of $160.

name: Nike Air Max 90 Glacier Blue

details.description:
The Nike Air Max 90 Glacier Blue presents the classic Tinker Hatfield silhouette dressed in frosty hues, inspired by the landscapes of the Arctic.

This sporty lifestyle sneaker builds upon a base of white mesh adorned with gray suede overlays at the toecap, side panel, and lower eyestays. A stone-colored suede side panel Swoosh is just above a leather mudguard in a shade of rich blue, inspired by the deep ice of the Arctic Ocean. This same deep blue is echoed in the TPU at the upper eyestays and the branding on the heel. The white foam insole provides cushioning and houses a visible unit of springy Air under the heel. The black rubber outsole with pods of Glacier Blue is deeply lugged for traction.

Our favorite aspect of this shoe is the addition of Glacier Blue TPU that gives this sneaker its locked-in icy look. The midsole Air unit frame, the side-panel Air Max branding window, the heel tab, and eyestay overlay all contribute to this sneaker’s signature wintry look. The Nike Air Max 90 Glacier Blue was released on March 20, 2024, for a retail price of $130.

name: Nike Air Max 90 Black Tiffany

details.description:
The Nike Air Max 90 Black Tiffany swaps the classic tan panels for black leather and mesh, highlights the visible Air unit, Swoosh, and lace eyelets, and sits on a black midsole and Waffle outsole.

The black Tiffany Air Max 90 by Nike has layered black leather overlays and intertwined underlays across the front and midfoot. There are Aurora Green accents on the TPU Swoosh, lace loops, heel "Nike Air" logo, and full-length visible Air unit. A molded foam midsole adds cushioning, while the black rubber Waffle outsole has traction patterns inherited from the original 1990 design.

The Nike Air Max 90 Black Tiffany is known for its upgraded mesh panels that allow for improved airflow without changing the classic look of the shoe while the Aurora Green on the Air unit adds contrast and color. The shoe was retailed at $130 when released on January 5, 2025.
